ability.Dragon Bane: This Pokemon's moves deal 1.3x damage to Fairy-type Pokemon.
ability.Celestial Watch: This Pokemon will never be affected by any status effect.

Heavenly Bite.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Dragon Fury.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

Celestial Roar.effect: Intimidates the opponents, lowering their Attack by 1 stage.

Heaven Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage each.
